.. _singularity_remote_list:

singularity remote list
-----------------------

List all singularity remote endpoints that are configured

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~



  The 'remote list' command lists all remote endpoints configured for use. If a remote
  is in use, its name will be encompassed by brackets.

::

  singularity remote list

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::


    $ singularity remote list

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for list

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`singularity remote <singularity_remote>` 	 - Manage singularity remote endpoints

*Auto generated by spf13/cobra on 12-May-2020*
